mapper.insert: insert into petinfo (member_id, petName, petVariety_id, petAncestry, petColour, petBirthday, petGender, petFeature, petClasses_id, petAllergyThing, petAncestryMark, petAncestryRegister, petState, petPic) values (#{member.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petvarietyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{petAncestry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petColour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{petGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petFeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petclassesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{petAllergyThing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petAncestryMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petAncestryRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update petinfo set member_id = #{memberId.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, petName = #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petVariety_id = #{petvarietyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, petAncestry = #{petAncestry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petColour = #{petColour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petBirthday = #{petBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, petGender = #{petGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, petFeature = #{petFeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petClasses_id = #{petclassesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, petAllergyThing = #{petAllergyThing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petAncestryMark = #{petAncestryMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, petAncestryRegister = #{petAncestryRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petState = #{petState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petPic = #{petPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, member_id, petName, petVariety_id, petAncestry, petColour, petBirthday, petGender, petFeature, petClasses_id, petAllergyThing, petAncestryMark, petAncestryRegister, petState, petPic from petinfo where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, member_id, petName, petVariety_id, petAncestry, petColour, petBirthday, petGender, petFeature, petClasses_id, petAllergyThing, petAncestryMark, petAncestryRegister, petState, petPic from petinfo
